notesStmt.note: Rough, unprofessional hand; text breaks denoted by a space plus a sof pasuḳ; A folio from a Hebrew treatise offering advise and predictions according to astrological conditions on the date of birth.
Condition: nearly complete; shaped around uneven cut of parchment.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).

keywords.term: Astrology, Hebrew , to 1800 , Early works to 1800
